context_of_use: The system allows customers to complete purchases and track their order status.
scope: Customer checkout and order tracking functionalities.
description: Enables customers to complete purchases (checkout) using multiple payment methods and track the status of their orders.
preconditions: Customer has selected products to purchase.
Customer is logged into their account.
postconditions: Customer receives confirmation of order status.
assumptions: Customer has a valid payment method.
System is operational and capable of processing transactions.
requirements_met: Customer can checkout using multiple payment methods.
main_flow: 1. Customer selects checkout option → System displays payment methods.
2. Customer selects a payment method and confirms order → System processes the payment.
3. System confirms order and provides tracking information → Customer receives order confirmation.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): Customer cancels checkout → System returns to shopping cart.
AF-2 (from Step 2): Payment fails → System prompts customer to select a different payment method.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): System encounters an error during payment processing → System notifies customer of the error.
information_for_steps: 2. Order details including items and total cost.
